Divergences module

The Divergences module that contains all of our divergences written in TensorFlow

class models.Divergences.Discriminator_Penalty(penalty_weight)[source]

Bases: object

Discriminator penalty class penalizes the divergence objective functional during training. Allows for the (approximate) implementation of discriminator constraints.

evaluate(discriminator, x, y)[source]

depends on the choice of penalty

get_penalty_weight()[source]
set_penalty_weight(weight)[source]
class models.Divergences.Divergence(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: Model

Divergence D(P||Q) between random variables x~P, y~Q. Parent class where the common parameters and the common functions are defined.

discriminate(x)[source]

g(x)

discriminator_loss(x, y)[source]

same as self.estimate() (in principle)

estimate(x, y)[source]

same as self.eval_var_formula()

eval_var_formula(x, y)[source]

depends on the variational formula to be used

Bases: Discriminator_Penalty

class models.Divergences.Jensen_Shannon_LT(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: f_Divergence

Jensen-Shannon divergence class (based on Legendre transform) JS(P||Q), x~P, y~Q.

f_star(y)[source]

Legendre transform of f(y)=y*log(y)-(y+1)*log((y+1)/2)

final_layer_activation(y)[source]

Final layer activation function.

class models.Divergences.KLD_DV(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: Divergence

KL divergence class (based on the Donsker-Varahdan variational formula) KL(P||Q), x~P, y~Q.

eval_var_formula(x, y)[source]

Evaluation of variational formula of KL divergence (based on the Donsker-Varahdan variational formula), KL(P||Q), x~P, y~Q.

class models.Divergences.KLD_LT(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: f_Divergence

Kullback-Leibler (KL) divergence class (based on Legendre transform) KL(P||Q), x~P, y~Q.

f_star(y)[source]

Legendre transform of f(y)=y*log(y)

class models.Divergences.Pearson_chi_squared_HCR(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: Divergence

Pearson chi^2-divergence class (based on Hammersley-Chapman-Robbins bound) chi^2(P||Q), x~P, y~Q.

Evaluation of variational formula of Pearson chi^2-divergence (based on Hammersley-Chapman-Robbins bound), chi^2(P||Q), x~P, y~Q.

f_star(y)[source]

Legendre transform of f(y)=(y-1)^2

class models.Divergences.Renyi_Divergence_CC(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: Renyi_Divergence

Renyi divergence class (based on the convex-conjugate variational formula) R_alpha(P||Q), x~P, y~Q.

Final layer activation function, enforces positive values.

class models.Divergences.Renyi_Divergence_CC_rescaled(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: Renyi_Divergence_CC

Rescaled Renyi divergence class (based on the rescaled convex-conjugate variational formula) alpha*R_alpha(P||Q), x~P, y~Q.

final_layer_activation(y)[source]

Final layer activation function, enforces positive values.

class models.Divergences.Renyi_Divergence_WCR(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: Renyi_Divergence_CC
